states.notes:
Total tests are taken from the annotations on the charts on the page. 
Negatives = (Totals – Positives)
Positives occasionally update before totals do; do not revise negatives down, keep the last calculated negative.
Last Updated (Local Time) = (today's date + time = 00:00)

states.name: American Samoa

states.notes:
Dashboard now has a new tab that details total tested. 
Negative = Total - Positive.
We do not currently track it, but hospitalization and ICU data is available from [Maricopa County](https://www.maricopa.gov/5460/Coronavirus-Disease-2019) and [Pima County](https://webcms.pima.gov/cms/One.aspx?portalId=169&pageId=527452).

coreData.privateNotes:
PROCESS: ICU and Vent #s from "Characteristics" tab on dashboard. The state frequently updates, so you may save time by doing it last.

(5/03 aft RS) Totals haven't updated carrying neg.
(4/30 aft SPA/RS) Stats for Total Testing were entered higher than the dashboard. Negatives did not actually drop versus yesterday Publish shift              
(4/30 mor KWS): sudden drop in "Total Tested" number from 80,449 to 27,050; was a typo!

PROCESS: Current Hosp/Vent data is found on the main COVID-19 page

(5/12 RS) Cases and Hosp #s from reporting: https://covid-tracking.slack.com/archives/CUQ4MMTPD/p1589314019321800
(5/5 Aft RS) AR revised deaths down by 1
(5/4 Aft RS) Updates from Reporting. Negatives not updated
(5/2 aft QN/DPT) Positives, deaths, cur vent from reporting
(5/1 aft) Cases reported on page are higher (and newer) than dashboard, used this number
(5/1 ATS mor) Negatives reported on dashboard went down - used this value
(4/30 SPA aft) Data was updated by a Twitter post                                                           (4/28 RS) All data from presser, no updated on Negatives so that is unchanged
(4/27 mor MM) Deleting stale Cum Hosp + Cum ICU #s from 4/18

coreData.notes: Our data comes from a press release [from 5/1](https://6fe16cc8-c42f-411f-9950-4abb1763c703.filesusr.com/ugd/4bfff9_54e0ecfd113444029f54b7ebbcc92972.pdf)
coreData.privateNotes:
NB:  We track testing efforts in the US territory American Samoa. 
Samoa (aka Western Samoa) is an independent country. Do not confuse the two.

5/11 RS: Negatives updated from Reporting https://covid-tracking.slack.com/archives/CURFQNQJV/p1589223879283000

PROCESS: Check state site and media. Their tests take ~1 week to process. No confirmed cases yet. The best source for information is https://www.samoanews.com/covid-19
